data.eml:eml: Taxonomic status of Nimbocera Reiss, 1972, a junior synonym of Tanytarsus van der Wulp, 1874 (Diptera: Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sanseverino, Angela M., Trivinho-Strixino, Susana, Nessimian, Jorge L. (2010): Taxonomic status of Nimbocera Reiss, 1972, a junior synonym of Tanytarsus van der Wulp, 1874 (Diptera: Chironomidae). Zootaxa 2359: 43-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193613
